name: Leonardo.Ai
description: Leonardo.Ai is an AI-driven platform for generating high-quality visual assets for creative projects.
longDescription: Leonardo.Ai is a generative AI platform designed to empower creators, artists, and businesses by producing high-quality visual assets with speed and style consistency. It leverages advanced AI models to transform text prompts into stunning images, videos, and 3D textures, catering to industries like gaming, design, marketing, and architecture. The platform offers a user-friendly interface and customizable settings, making it accessible to both beginners and professionals. Its mission is to democratize creativity by combining imagination with cutting-edge technology, enabling users to bring their concepts to life efficiently. Leonardo.Ai also supports a vibrant community for collaboration and inspiration, fostering innovative content creation. The platform provides both free and paid plans to suit varying user needs.
features: AI Image Generation transforms text prompts into high-resolution visuals, supporting diverse styles for creative projects.
AI Canvas provides robust editing tools for precise image manipulation, including inpainting and outpainting.
3D Texture Generation creates realistic textures for 3D models, enhancing assets for gaming and design.
Prompt Enhance automatically refines simple prompts into detailed descriptions for better image output.
Realtime Canvas allows users to see images evolve as they type prompts, fostering an interactive creative process.
Model Fine-Tuning enables users to train custom AI models with their own datasets for style-consistent assets.
Flow State Mode generates an infinite stream of images based on a single prompt and style settings.
Video Generation creates videos from images or prompts, available to both free and paid users.

faqs.question: What is Leonardo.Ai used for?
faqs.answer: Leonardo.Ai is used to generate high-quality images, videos, and 3D textures for creative projects in gaming, design, marketing, and more.

faqs.question: Does Leonardo.Ai offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Leonardo.Ai provides a free plan with 150 daily tokens, allowing limited access to its core features.

faqs.question: Can I use Leonardo.Ai for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: Yes, images generated on Leonardo.Ai can be used commercially, but users must comply with the platform’s terms of service.

faqs.question: How does the Prompt Enhance tool work?
faqs.answer: The Prompt Enhance tool takes a simple user prompt and expands it into a detailed description to improve the accuracy of generated images.

faqs.question: Is coding knowledge required to use Leonardo.Ai?
faqs.answer: No, Leonardo.Ai’s intuitive interface and tutorials make it accessible to users without coding skills.

faqs.question: What are API credits, and how are they used?
faqs.answer: API credits are used to perform actions like image generation, with costs varying based on settings, trackable via the Pricing Calculator.

faqs.question: Can I collaborate with others on Leonardo.Ai?
faqs.answer: Yes, Leonardo.Ai offers collaboration tools and a community on Discord and Facebook for sharing and inspiration.
